about.server: We’re currently utilizing VPS services to sustain a low-cost operation, a total of 4 servers hosted in Canada and Singapore for better connectivity, each server having 4vCPU + 8GB RAM + 160GB SSD.
about.company: A Brazilian startup exploring interactive media through smart contracts. Founded on solid values: community benefit>individuals; purpose>profit; open innovation>patents; trust on tech>stamps. We consider our pool as a business operation to support the network, not our core business.
